paper_abstract: We give a simple O(n log n) algorithm to compute the convex hull of the (possibly (-) (n(2)) ) intersection points in an arrangement of n line segments in the plane. We also show an arrangement of dn hyperplanes in d-dimensions whose arrangement has intersection points on the convex hull. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Capturing crossings: Convex hulls of segment and plane intersections
